name: Two In One: Rock-Paper-Scissor & Snake-Water-Gun
description:
Hey there, wanna play Rock-Paper-Scissor or Snake-Water-Gun with the computer? Well, you can play both of them here!

This online game consists of two of the famous traditional games that people use to play (Rock-Paper-Scissor and Snake-Water-Gun)  in many places, now you can play it with the computer also!
